div.p: Flu shots will be given on Monday, October 30, 2017 from 9am – 2:30pm in the auditorium lobby. They are free to students, parents, and community members. Students must have signed consent forms to receive the vaccination.

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-home current-menu-item page_item page-item-2308 current_page_item

a.span: OSSAA Boys Area II Playoff Bracket
OSSAA Girls Area II Playoff Bracket

div.p: Kiowa Public Schools is dedicated to serving all children, because all children can learn and be, in their own manner, a crucial part of society. This school has been in the education business since 1872 and many children, parents, teachers, administrators, and Boards of Educations have come and gone; but the entity itself still stands as the foundation of learning and success today.
Education is an action, a process by which the development of a child is intentionally directed to achieving the utmost of their potential in the best possible manner.
At Kiowa Public School we believe that the key to successfully educating children is "motivation." A motivated child is one whose appetite has been whetted and will learn forever.

div.div: © 2020 Kiowa Public School. All Rights Reserved. Muffin group
